Text: doesn't Quantum theory come out only oct 12?

@gn333444 - you're obviously new to this. Many games are leaked early and posted for download. MorphX comes out next month, and it was available a few months ago.  Halo Reach was out about a week before "official" release.
So it says PAL in the title, so does that mean it wont play in the US.  Is there a RF version coming.
